publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1488 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion-That the Parliament agrees that the time for consideration of Stage 3 of the Transport (Scotland) Bill be allocated as follows, so that debate on each part of the proceedings, if not previously brought to a conclusion, shall be brought to a conclusion on the expiry of the specified period (calculated from the time when Stage 3 begins)- Group 1 to Group 2 - no later than 30 minutes Group 3 to Group 15 - no later than 1 hour 45 minutes Group 16 to Group 17 - no later than 2 hours 30 minutes Group 18 to Group 22 - no later than 3 hours 30 minutes Group 23 to Group 29 - no later than 4 hours 30 minutes Motion to pass the Bill - no later than 5 hours Supported by: Tavish Scott*
